name: QuizoftheDayBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Quiz of the Day skill provides users with new questions each day.

This flash briefing gives the results of those questions, statistics and leaderboard information.

Just ask Alexa to Play Quiz of the Day.

If you like our skill, please encourage us by reviewing the same on the skill store by visiting www.quizoftheday.org
 
If you have feedback on how we can improve the skill, please contact us on feedback@quizoftheday.org.

You know what? You can also suggest us new questions to be asked by filling a form here: http://bit.ly/quizotd

Thank you!

*Disclaimer: The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only.

You can connect with us on Twitter at https://twitter.com/AskQuizOfTheDay and Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/AskQuizOftheDay

Thank you so much!

 -Quiz of the Day team!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
